item.title: SwiftUI: Success Animation
item.description: A simple implementation of a success animation. Source code available at: https://github.com/kanekin/SwiftUISuccessAnimation

item.title: Missing Tutorial for Swift UI (Network and MVVM): Introduction
item.description: TL;DR: We will make this app. What is this article? A iOS native app development tutorial with Swift UI, MVVM, Network. The app makes network calls to TMDB API to demonstrate the flow of fetching data and update the UI on a Swift UI app. Target audience People with prior programming experience but not on the iOS platform. Finished apple’s official Swift UI tutorial and want to take it one step further.
